2.6.530.changelog:
# Release 2.6

## Disclaimer

This release is not state-compatible with previous software versions; configuration scripts need to be adapted and will need to be reapplied.

## New Features
**vscriptd** Permit uploads to the persistent /config partition (meant for auto-starting user plugins)

**AT300** Add 3 new JPEG-XS application images with 16 JPEG-XS TX/RX instances in total (16/0, 0/16 or 8/8)

**RTPReceiver** Add Unicast support

**AT300** (beta) Audio mixer and virtual panel UI

**NMOS** added an option to prefix senders and receivers with their respective media type

**Matrix** added preliminary support for Unicast transmission

**syslog** added support for ISO8601 date format

**Webserver** When using KTLS, bypass OpenSSL once a connection has been established to restore wss interoperability with some clients

**AT300** Assert SFF/page 0/byte 93/bit 2 to improve compatibility with Power Class 5-7 modules

**AT300** Updated I/O module firmware (includes AT300-specific optimizations)

**ALL** A new service "vscriptd" allows for user scripts to be executed on the blade. The current version is not yet feature-complete and has not been thoroughly tested, and is thus disabled by default. To enable it, set system.services.vscriptd to true

**AVP/AT300** There is now full support for 6G UHD standards, including SDI I/O

**ALL** (pre-release) REST API allows easy access to single parameters

**GUI** (live view) added interval to check for lazy thumbnails

**GUI** (ppms) changed behaviour of dropdown; showing channel group selection even if channels are empty

**GUI** (flows) Rx/Tx Wizards now have selection for creation of multiple video/audio tx/rx

**GUI** (flows) Selecting inputs without outputs will now assign null as source

**GUI** Pausing some processing and rendering while tab is inactive to reduce cpu/gpu utilization

**GUI** Added entries in menu; added build_info and number of active_connections to about section

**GUI** Added /active_licenses.json in licenses section

**GUI** Searchable dropdown lists should behave correct now, now closing when clicking outside of opened dropdown

**GUI** Moved all download links to burger menu

**GUI** (ip address)(ip setup) Fixed bug where adding rows deleted form values

**GUI** (ip address)(ip setup) Added description to leave gateway bytes to "0.0.0.0" to apply default gateway

**GUI** (ip address)(ip setup) Fixed bug where an undefined value in the "weight" (or from 2.7 "metric") field was interpreted as number 0

**GUI** (nmos setup) Fixed bug where changes were not applied to persistent config

**GUI** (flows) Added option to show routes from outputs to inputs

**GUI** (flows) Added list filters

**GUI** (flows) Added traffic information for audio/video receivers/transmitters on right-click

**GUI** (flows)(beta - !work in progress!) Added wizards to create multiple transmitter/receiver sessions with fixed number of video/audio transmitters/receivers

**GUI** (flows)(wizards) Added audio-only option for RTP Receivers

**GUI** (flows)(external sdp) Fixed showing number of video/audio transmitters in list; fixed showing row_name

**GUI** (players/delays) upload of png files can now specify the exact standard (if supported) in the file name. E.g. "mystill_HD1080i50.png"

## Changes/Enhancements/Bug fixes

**Matrix** TX JPEG_XS license management

**Matrix** Don't restart video signal generator (VSG) when the active standard is written again

**Matrix** Restart the VSG when `t_src` is changed

**Matrix** Make SDI input debouncing configurable (except for phy lock changes), add change counters for both `output.standard` and `hw_status.standard`

**RTPReceiver** Fix potential JPEG-XS timing bug at read delays < 1 frame

**CC3D** Bundle NBCU LUTs

**RTPTransmitter/Matrix** Fix crossbar bug that could cause "mild" stream corruption for >3G streams (where 50% of the packets would be time-shifted relative to the other half by one frame)

**RTPTransmitter** Fix bug that would have SPS transmitters use different SSRCs on their two network paths

**RTPReceiver** Fix control issue that made it difficult to get rid of incorrect, stream-shared SDPs

**RTPReceiver** Don't crash on reboot if there is an unconfigured ancburst receiver

**AT300/JPEGXS_TX** fixed FCnt in JpegXS header in interlaced standards incrementing at the wrong time

**NMOS** Acknowledge SDP requests upon accepting the SDP instead of upon
video-reception. This would lead to request timing out in case of network
malfunction.

**NMOS** delay 200-204 http-responses on "activate_immediate" requests to
senders until request-completion

**vapi** permit .write(...) calls to explicitly skip validation (whereas previously this would require a pointless always-true validator, and wait for at least one response)

**RTPReceiver** fix SDP parsing issue that would cause flows to be misidentified as having a color depth of only 8 bits

**SampleRateConverter/AT1130** fix recently introduced channel duplication issue

**SDI Inputs/AT1130** fix async audio deembedding issue when running with 3G/UHD standards

**RTPReceiver** permit shorter minimum read delays (relies on the TP= parameter, so having this parameter set correctly may not be relevant in some cases, whereas previously it would always be ignored)

**PTP** provide more details on discarded sync/delay messages to help with PTP debugging

**RTPReceiver** fix an issue where multiple receiver sharing the same (incorrect) SDP could only be relieved of their misery by sending a correct SDP multiple times; this should no longer be necessary (when running in Patch mode)

**Matrix** robustly handle lost BNC input interrupts

**RTPReceiver** fix an issue where audio receivers running in servo mode would reserve more hardware resources than required

**NMOS** always set "rtp_enabled" on receiver transport parameters

**JPEGXS** 6G SDI bugfixes

**PTP** Fix GPGGA parser bug that would render GPS inputs inoperable at negative geoid heights (which includes about half of the world, but unfortunately not our company offices)

**TimeFlows** don't have combinators advertise oversized drift/error estimates if `min_drift_tolerance` of `min_offset_tolerance` are large

**SampleRateConverter** Fixed a bug that could prevent SRC instances from
being routable to audio shufflers

**SampleRateConverter** Fixed a bug that could interfere with channel capacity
configuration

**Advanced/Debug UI** Fix bug in reference selector where table entries would not be shown unless table[0] was allocated

**vscript/vapi** Previously, towels would not be cleared on a close() call directly preceded by reboot()

**RTPTransmitter** Advertise estimated video stream bandwidths using b=AS:([0-9+]) lines

**IPA** Fix signal corruption issue in compressor

**IPA** Fix bug in loudness computation

**GUI** (flows) fixed bugs where creation/deletion of some sources/destination were not recognized

## Overview

**AT300/AVP_100GbE** 36x RTPVidTx, 32x RTPVidRx, 511x RTPAudTx, 256x RTPAudRx, 32x RTPAnc/BurstRx, 24x ColCorr (12x 3D-LUT based), 24x VidMix/Key, 16x VidRePlay, 128x AudRePlay, AudioGain, 3x 384 AudioSRCs, 563x AudioShuffler, 20x VC2Enc, 32x VC2Dec, 2x LTCGen, 3x VidGenlock, 3x AudGenlock, 2x VidSignalGen, AudioSignalGen silence/400Hz/440Hz/1kHz, 3x MasterClock LTC-Gen, 16x Audio N-Minus-1, 64x AudioMixer, 256x LoudnessMetering

**AT300/JPEGXS_RX_100GbE** 32x RTPVidRX, 8x JPEGXSDec, 16x VC2Dec, 30x RTPVidTx ...

**AT300/JPEGXS_TX_100GbE** 30x RTPVidTx. 8x JPEGXSEnc, 32x RTPVidRx, 32x VC2Dec ...

Release 2.6 supports **C100  AVP / AVP_40GbE / CC3D_40GbE / JPEGXS_40GbE / PCAP_40GbE / UDX_40GbE

For a detailed list of hardware capabilities, please load the application you wish to use and refer to http://<ip-address-of-your-AT300>/runtime_constants.json
